thread.title: Sanaz
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Sanaz

author: Sanaz
title: Sanaz
text: Erik's bike shop provides outstanding customer service. I spoke with a couple different people requested pictures that were provided right away. The bikes have arrived and are perfect! My kids are very happy. Thank you again. What a wonderful experience and we will be sure to continue purchasing through your store.
